title: Romantic interlude
text:
THE NATION July 8, 2015 1:00 am 
Riva Surya Treat yourself to a romantic candle-lit dinner at babble & rum riverside restaurant, go for a walk around the lively entertainment district of Bang Lamphu ... BANGKOK Romantic interlude Take a little break from the kids, kick back and enjoy yourselves with Riva Surya's exclusive "Parent's Escape" package. Treat yourself to a romantic candle-lit dinner at babble & rum riverside restaurant, go for a walk around the lively entertainment district of Bang Lamphu or just relax with a drink and spend some quality time together. Take advantage of Riva Surya's baby-sitting service and let your worries melt away. The package includes two nights' accommodation in a Deluxe Riva Room, daily breakfast for two, one candle-lit dinner, baby-sitting service from 7 to 10pm and Wi-Fi. The package costs Bt12,900 and is available until October 31. Call (02) 633 5000 or e-mail: stay@rivasuryabangkok.com. Visit www.RivaSuryabangkok.com. KRABI Feels like green spirit Explore the green spirit at Pakasai in Krabi. The Green Traveller package includes a two-night stay in a Deluxe Green Chalet with daily breakfast, a half-day canoe trip to the Tha-Lane grotto with a picnic and planting a tree at a school in Ao Nang. The deal costs Bt7,100 for two and is valid through October 15. E-mail: rest@pakasai.com and quote "Green Traveller". Visit www.Pakasai.com. Join the Club The Okura Prestige Bangkok gives Bangkok's visitors an attractive choice of room types - Okura Club, Premier Club and Prestige Club - as part of its Okura Experience package. Rates start at Bt11,500 per night and include choice of daily international buffet breakfast at Up & Above or Japanese set breakfast at Yamazato, unlimited access to the Okura Club Lounge, evening cocktails, complimentary laundry/pressing (two items per day), high-speed Internet access as well as express check-in/check-out. The offer is good until December 25. Call (02) 687 9000 or e-mail: reservations@okurabangkok.com. Visit www.OkuraBangkok.com MALDIVES Dusit dreams Take advantage of Dusit Island Getaways offer and discover the magic of the award-winning Dusit Thani Maldives. Starting at US$499 per person per night based on double occupancy, the package includes accommodation in a Beach Villa, daily breakfast, lunch and dinner including select alcoholic beverages, guided House Reef Snorkel Tour, late check-out until 3pm, 20- per-cent discount on treatments at Devarana Spa and special rate for seaplane transfer at US$200 per person each way. E-mail: resmaldives@dusit.com. HUA HIN Love, actually Asara Villa and Suite in the resort town of Hua Hin welcomes lovers, old and young, with an "Always Love You" package. Priced at Bt30,990 for two, it includes three nights in a one-bedroom pool Villa, daily breakfast, romantic candle-lit-dinner for two, a 90-minute spa treatment or massage, complimentary sparkling wine, honeymoon turndown set up and selected discounts at the restaurants and spa. The offer is valid through October 31. Call (032) 547 555 or e-mail: info@asaravillaandsuite.com. PHUKET In the lap of luxury Discover Phuket with friends and take advantage of the New Residential Villa with 2 to 6 bedrooms at Trisara. The Destination Trisara Package includes Immigration Fast Track service at the airport, private in-villa BBQ, personal shopper, private full-day cruise on a sport cruiser yacht (8 persons) or flybridge yacht (12 persons) to Krabi and Phi Phi Islands. The price for parties of up to 8 persons is US$350 per person plus a one-time surcharge of $1,625 for the cruise trip. For parties of up to 12 persons, the surcharge is $4,815 due to use of a larger yacht. The rates are available from now until October 31. Call (076) 310 100 or e-mail: reservations@trisara.com. 257 Viewed
